thread.title: SOMS Technologies Announces New microGreen Extended Performance Fuel Filter Line

author: cbs8
title: SOMS Technologies Announces New microGreen Extended Performance Fuel Filter Line
text:
SOMS Technologies LLC
High performance filtration company announces fuel filter design to expand fuel and maintenance savings to more vehicles
VALHALLA, N.Y. , Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SOMS Technologies LLC, the manufacturer of the microGreen® Extended Performance Filters , today announced the microGreen Extended Performance Fuel Filter , a long-lasting fuel filter that can achieve cost savings of more than 50 percent for any given vehicle. Extensive industry standard laboratory tests demonstrate that the microGreen fuel filter exceeds industry standards for performance and capacity.
microGreen's advanced fuel filtration technology makes engine maintenance easier by extending the lifetime of the fuel filter, requiring fewer filter changes. The change schedule can be customized to fleet requirements, ensuring vehicles stay on the road without interfering with maintenance schedules.
"The microGreen Extended Performance Fuel Filter is proven to last longer and perform better, which dramatically saves time and money for large fleets as well as individual owners," said microGreen CEO Camilla Shumaker .
Features of the microGreen Extended Performance Fuel Filter include:
Easily installed on any vehicle More than 50 percent lifetime savings on fuel filter costs Significant waste reduction Less maintenance time The microGreen Extended Performance Fuel Filter is currently available to purchase on the microGreen website , at Amazon.com or fleets can contact sales at sales@somstech.com .
About microGreen Extended Performance Filters
microGreen ® Extended Performance Filters are technologically advanced vehicle filtration products that significantly reduce maintenance costs for both individual vehicles and fleets and are better for the environment. Using unique designs, patented technologies and premium materials, microGreen filters achieve extended performance with filtration efficiency and capacity far beyond the capabilities of standard conventional filters. microGreen filters have been overwhelmingly accepted by leading national and local fleets as a way to reduce maintenance costs and protect the environment. The company is headquartered in Valhalla , NY. For more information, visit www.microGreenfilter.com .
